## hpr1249 :: Software Patents: Who's Behind the Curtain?

 

Deb Nicholson works at the intersection of technology and social justice. She is the Community Outreach Director at the Open Invention Network https://www.openinventionnetwork.com and the Community Manager at GNU MediaGoblin https://www.openinventionnetwork.com. She also serves on the board at Open Hatch https://openhatch.org/, a non-profit dedicated to matching prospective free software contributors with communities, tools and education. She lives in the United States in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
